footer.credits_before_astro: Designed and built by Qnurye, proudly powered

landing.line2: As I crawl a cracked and broken path

about.title: About
about.unemployed_text: I am looking for an internship opportunity.
about.interests_text: I like films, music, reading. Favorite bands are Omnipotent Youth Society, King Crimson, and Pink Floyd. Favorite classical music is Impressionism.

application.description: You can add your link as follows:

pr.title: Create a pull request to add a link
pr.content:
1. Fork my repository on GitHub [Qnurye/qnuryes](https://github.com/Qnurye/qnuryes)
2. In your own repository, create a new json file in `src/content/links`, name it after yourself, and refer to other files for content. You need to provide the following information:
    1. Name
    2. Avatar URL
    3. Link
    4. Link description (you may need to provide multiple language versions, but all except English are optional)
 3. Submit your changes and create a pull request to my repository on GitHub.

email.title: Can't understand the above :(
email.content: You can contact me directly at [contact@qnury.es](mailto:contact@qnury.es)

application.i18n_changes: This site may (but not likely) add support for other languages in the future. If that happens, I will use AI to translate the English version of the description into the new language and notify you via GitHub or email.
